DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect Exenatide Treatment Mean 24-Hour Heart Rate Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes . Treated metformin and/or thiazolidinedione . HbA1c 6.5 % 9.5 % , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 25 kg/m^2 < 40 kg/m^2 . Have previously receive exenatide glucagonlike peptide1 analog . Have participate interventional medical , surgical , pharmaceutical study ( study experimental , drug , medical , surgical treatment give ) within 30 day screen . This criterion include drug receive regulatory approval indication time study entry . Receiving beta blocker . Receiving treatment drug directly affect gastrointestinal motility , include limited Reglan® ( metoclopramide ) , Propulsid® ( cisapride ) , chronic macrolide antibiotic . Have receive treatment systemic glucocorticoid therapy oral , intravenous ( IV ) , intramuscular ( IM ) route within 6 week screen , regularly treat potent , inhale intranasal steroid know high rate systemic absorption bronchodilator . Have treat drug promote weight loss ( example , Adipex® [ phentermine ] , Acomplia® [ rimonabant ] , Xenical® [ orlistat ] , Meridia® [ sibutramine ] , Acutrim® [ phenylpropanolamine ] , similar overthecounter medication ) within 3 month screen . Have treat longer 2 week follow excluded medication within 3 month prior screen : *Insulin ; *Alphaglucosidase inhibitor ( example , Glyset® [ miglitol ] Precose® [ acarbose ] ) ; *Meglitinides ( example , Prandin® [ repaglinide ] Starlix® [ nateglinide ] ) ; *Sulfonylureas ( example , Glucotrol® [ glipizide ] Micronase® [ glyburide ] ) ; *Dipeptidyl peptidase IV ( DPPIV ) inhibitor ( example , Januvia™ [ sitagliptin ] ) Have donate blood within 60 day screen .
